mapper.select: SELECT srcc.id, srcc.check_item_id, srcc.check_item_type, srcc.risk_rout, sri.name FROM sick_risk_checkitem_config srcc LEFT JOIN sick_risk_item sri ON sri.id = srcc.sick_risk_id WHERE srcc.check_item_id = ${check_item_id} AND srcc.check_item_type = ${check_item_type} ORDER by srcc.id DESC
